SELECT ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_IMG_PATH, ITEM_IMG_NAME, ITEM_SIZE_WIDTH, ITEM_SIZE_HEIGHT FROM TBL_ITEM WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT TBC.ID AS ID, TBC.ITEM_ID AS ITEM_ID, TBC.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_ID, TBI.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME, TBI.ITEM_IMG_NAME AS ITEM_IMG_NAME, TBI.ITEM_IMG_PATH AS ITEM_IMG_PATH, TBC.CART_ITEM_COUNT AS BUY_ITEM_COUNT, TBI.ITEM_TYPE AS ITEM_TYPE, TBI.ITEM_PRICE AS ITEM_PRICE, (TBI.ITEM_PRICE * TBC.CART_ITEM_COUNT) AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM TBL_CART TBC JOIN TBL_ITEM TBI ON TBC.ITEM_ID = TBI.ID AND TBC.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
